sense.gloss: to pinch, to hold (between one's fingers), to pick up (with chopsticks, tweezers, etc.)
to pick up and eat, to snack on
to pick out (the main point), to summarize, to sum up
to bewitch, to possess, to fascinate

sdata.e: Do we have anything I can snack on?

sdata.j: イチゴは↑私↑↓わたし↓たちが↑摘↑↓|つま↓む|はしから↑熟↑↓じゅく↓しかけていた。
sdata.e: The berries were ripening almost as fast as we could gather them.

sdata.j: ↑新茶↑↓しんちゃ↓を↑摘↑↓|つま↓む|↑季↑↓き↓↑節↑↓ぶし↓になった。
sdata.e: This is the season to pick fresh tea.
